name: Paradise Restaurant
description: Famous for authentic Hyderabadi biryani and traditional cuisine. A legendary establishment serving the royal flavors of Nizams since 1953.

location.address: Near Persis Hotel, M.G Road, Secunderabad, Telangana 500003

images.caption: The world-famous Paradise biryani with aromatic basmati rice
A royal feast of Mughlai delicacies

allergenInfo.nuts: Contains cashews and almonds in some dishes
allergenInfo.dairy: Ghee and yogurt used in cooking

items.name: Hyderabadi Chicken Biryani
items.description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked with tender chicken pieces, saffron, and authentic Hyderabadi spices. Served with raita and shorba.

items.name: Mutton Biryani
items.description: Premium mutton pieces slow-cooked with aged basmati rice and royal spices. A true Nizami delicacy.

items.name: Vegetable Biryani
items.description: Mixed vegetables and paneer cooked with fragrant rice and mild spices. Perfect for vegetarians.

items.name: Chicken 65
items.description: Spicy fried chicken pieces marinated in yogurt and special spices. A perfect starter.

items.name: Haleem
items.description: Traditional slow-cooked lentils with meat, wheat, and aromatic spices. A Ramadan specialty available year-round.

items.name: Qubani Ka Meetha
items.description: Traditional Hyderabadi dessert made with apricots, cream, and nuts. A royal sweet ending.

name: Shah Ghouse Cafe
description: Authentic Hyderabadi cuisine with famous kebabs and biryanis. A local favorite in the heart of Old City since 1989.

images.alt: Shah Ghouse Cafe's famous seekh kebabs
images.caption: Juicy seekh kebabs grilled to perfection

items.name: Mutton Seekh Kebab
items.description: Hand-rolled minced mutton kebabs grilled over charcoal with aromatic spices and herbs.

items.name: Chicken Tikka
items.description: Tender chicken pieces marinated in yogurt and spices, grilled in tandoor.

items.name: Mutton Biryani
items.description: Slow-cooked mutton with basmati rice, fried onions, and special garam masala.

items.name: Chicken Shorba
items.description: Clear chicken soup with herbs and spices. Perfect to start your meal.

items.name: Roomali Roti
items.description: Paper-thin handkerchief bread, perfect with kebabs and curries.

name: Jewel of Nizam
description: Fine dining restaurant specializing in royal Nizami cuisine with an elegant ambiance. Experience the grandeur of Hyderabadi royal dining.

images.caption: An exquisite presentation of royal Nizami cuisine

images.alt: Elegant dining room with royal decor
images.caption: Luxurious dining experience fit for royalty

allergenInfo.nuts: Almonds, cashews, and pistachios used in several dishes
allergenInfo.dairy: Can be prepared without dairy on request

items.name: Royal Nizami Thali
items.description: A complete royal experience with 12 authentic dishes including biryani, kebabs, curries, and desserts.

items.name: Shikampuri Kebab
items.description: Stuffed lamb patties with mint chutney, a royal delicacy from the Nizam's kitchen.

items.name: Nizami Handi
items.description: Slow-cooked mutton curry in traditional clay pot with aromatic spices and saffron.

items.name: Vegetarian Royal Thali
items.description: Elaborate vegetarian spread with paneer dishes, dal, vegetables, and traditional sweets.

items.name: Double Ka Meetha
items.description: Royal bread pudding with nuts, cardamom, and rose water. A Nizami classic dessert.

name: Chutneys
description: Popular South Indian restaurant chain known for authentic dosas, idlis, and traditional breakfast items. A vegetarian paradise.

location.address: Road No. 12, Banjara Hills, Hyderabad, Telangana 500034

images.caption: Authentic South Indian breakfast with fresh chutneys

allergenInfo.nuts: Coconut used in chutneys and some dishes

items.name: Masala Dosa
items.description: Crispy rice crepe filled with spiced potato curry, served with coconut chutney and sambar.

items.name: Idli Sambar
items.description: Steamed rice cakes served with lentil soup and assorted chutneys. Traditional breakfast.

items.name: Rava Dosa
items.description: Crispy semolina crepe with onions and spices, served with chutneys.

items.name: Uttapam
items.description: Thick pancake topped with vegetables like onions, tomatoes, and chilies.

items.name: Filter Coffee
items.description: Traditional South Indian coffee brewed with chicory and served with hot milk.

items.name: Coconut Chutney
items.description: Fresh coconut ground with green chilies and curry leaves. Perfect accompaniment.
